38178470.review:
Como um arcade, esse jogo é excelente! Mesmo tendo que se mover usando a s setas e mirar usando o mouse, é possível fazer ambos sem problema algum. Os controles são precisos e o jogo flui muito bem. A dificuldade do jogo é média para os primeiros cinco níveis e brutal nos próximos cinco níveis. 
O jogo conta com (pelo menos até o dia em essa análise foi feita) seis personagens diferentes, com pontos fortes e fracos em cada um, como a torradeira que tem mais vida, o chalé que atira de perto, o fazedor de pão com tiros que podem acertar mais de um inimigo e o liquidificador que absorve projéteis e faz algo com eles. 
Também há seis especiais que têm efeitos diferentes para cada personagem e que podem ser trocados após cada mini chefe e upgrades para o personagem após cada chefe (apesar de não ser claro qual o efeito de cada um à primeira vista, é fácil compreender o que cada um faz após pegá-lo). E caso queira um desafio extra ou conseguir uma pontuação maior mais rápido, há temperos que que aumentam quantidade de pontos obtidos, mas acabam dificultando o jogo em um aspecto. 
O visual do jogo é bem agradável, e a música combina bastante com o jogo, além de ser muito boa

38052185.review:
Now, I recieved this game for free from the Developer, however I'd like to put a small review down for it.

At first, the game looks entirely like any normal bullethell and at FIRST that is how it is, your normal kind of food-styled bullethell. However after your first death if you are like me you unlocked a new character (That and you found out about the spice rack) and this is where things becoming more interesting and fun. 

From this point on you can use a small range of characters, all of whom have different playstyles and use powerups differently. And you can make the game harder as you get better at it which provides some very fun situations and encounters for you

25641628.review: This game embodies the spirit of Miyamoto.  A game that is easy to learn but difficult to master.  It is a game I own over several accounts and platforms.  It is a game that I have enjoyed for hours but is also great when I have a few minutes to kill.  I also applaud the developer of this game for the business model.  A fair price up front, but then no attempt to gauge with endless online purchses etc.  Once you buy this all future content is included.  Over the last 6 months I have been surprised on a fairly regular basis with new content releases.   That is really cool.  Its like getting a new game every so often.  To me this shows a real passion from the designer.  A passion for the art and a passion for the creation.  This should be supported and applauded and I cannot wait to see what this designer comes up with next.

24440106.review:
[h1]★ Introduction[/h1]
Champions of Breakfast was published on the 1st April 2016 which was developed and published by Pirate Software.
This game has it's own high pedestal amongst bullet hells. As one plays, you'll constantly learn new things about the game and strategies to thwart the game's various fast-pacd enemies. 

[h1]★ Gameplay[/h1]
Unlocking new characters to play as that all play differently is super fun, and when you find those one or two characters that just CLICK even stronger with your playstyle thats when the fun begins but on the other side 
bullet hell seems to be a over used and repetitve genre that lacks user progression and gets repetitve rather quickly
I'm not saying Champions of Breakfast is a great bullet hell game but it does cover a few areas that some other bullet hell games don't.

The 'Spice Cabinet' allows you to modify the abilities and difficulty of enemies in order to increase how many points collect to aid you in you quest for the top of the competitive leaderboard! Regardless of competition though, you can always try and imprive your own game. The feeling when you overcome a type of enemy that always gave you trouble is so emboldening. 

You will find few bosses that you encounter in various places in the house and outside, all of them will do different attacks that you should probably want to remember so that you are ready for what they are about to do.
I wont talk much about this game because personally its not my type but its a great game with some great potentials

[*]Challenging bosses with a unique 'bullet style' for each one

[/list]

[b]Cons[/b]

24124561.review:
This is my first bullet hell and it is very true and easy to get into the genre. I died my first go but I noticed as the backgrounds change the enemies do as well so after a while you start to get used to it and try to go as far as possible.
At the moment the game doesn't have a lot of options but I spoke to the dev and he said they were gonna be on that as soon as they can. The game has a system where you can challenge yourself and make the game harder for yourself in the spice rack and I thought that was very cool for those who love bullet hells. Overall the game has pretty good base content for the small price of 4.99 and has lots of achievments and trading cards. Recommended!

24110117.review:
調理器具が朝食の材料を集めるために
日用品と戦いを繰り広げるシューティングゲーム。
世界観は割と意味不明だけど、まぁ些細な事でしょう。

大枠としてはウェーブ／ステージ構成の
ツインスティック全方位シューティング。
一般的な全方位シューティングはアリーナ形式で、
枠の中にランダムに湧いてくる敵を延々さばき続ける
ものが多いけども、このゲームはステージごとに
何種類かの雑魚出現パターンが用意されていて、
それがどういう順番で出てくるかだけが
ランダムに選ばれるという形式。なので純アリーナ型の
全方位シューに比べるとアドリブや反射神経の
要求度合いが低く、パターン構築で対処できる部分が多い、
普通の面構成のシューティングとの折衷案のような形です。
ステージごとに最後のウェーブにはボスが用意されてるのも
普通のシューティングゲームっぽいですね。

この辺の混合バランスが結構絶妙で、きちんと経験が
蓄積されて力になりつつも各回のプレイには揺らぎが生じて
飽きさせないという、なかなか面白い仕上がりになっています。
またパワーアップアイテムの取得にランダム要素が強く、
どのタイミングで何がドロップするのかがかなり運任せで、
かつ入手したパワーアップは累積されて効果を増していくので、
自機の仕上がりがプレイごとに結構変わってくるのも
面白いところ。ちょっとローグライクっぽいかもしれません。
自機ごとの性能の差別化も明確で、同じ強化アイテムでも
効果が違ったりするなど、結構凝ってます。

ただ値段から分かるかとは思いますが、そんなにボリュームが
あるゲームというわけではありません。基本的なステージは
4つのみ。全てをクリアすると敵パターンが凶悪になった
2周目が始まり、これもクリアすると3周目以降は
パターン据え置きで敵の体力や移動速度が上昇していく中で、
どれだけ生き残ってスコアを稼げるかという感じになります。
そういう意味ではシンプルではあるんですが、
程よくプレイに変化があるので飽きにくく、かといって
死んだ場合に運が悪かったのではなく腕が悪かったと
思える程度にはきちんとシューティングゲームをしており、
端的に言ってお勧めです。特に伝統的な縦／横シューはやるけど
全方位シューはちょっと……と食わず嫌いをしている方は是非。
全方位シューは狙って撃つっていう感覚が強くて、
これはこれで面白いんですよ。

24069880.review: If you're a fan of  bullet hell type genre, served with some difficult flavor along with some bacons, then this is the complete breakfast for you.

23782051.review:
Простая по исполнению, но тем не менее быстрая и динамичная аркада, с до воли знакомым геймплеем и правилами ещё с игровых автоматов прошлого века. 
В игре даже есть сюжет - часть домашней утвари попутала понятия и стащила часть необходимых на кухне продуктов и игридиентов. И тут в дело вступают наши герои: чайник, хлебопечка, тостер, миксер и микроволновка, которые поклялись на "Большой поваренной книге" вернуть украденное на кухню. Играем мы за одного изизбранных на выбор (сначала из 3, потом ещё 2 открываются) - у каждого из них своя механика игры и атака, но у каждого одна цель - выжить в этой адской кухне уничтожая врагов раньше, чем они уничтожат вас.
+ динамичный геймплей, где потребуется всё ваше внимание
+ разные типы врагов и их атак
+ для особо хардкорных есть возможность приправами "прокачать" монстров для усложнения игры и попутно увеличить получаемые за прохождение очки
+ рандомная генерация типа врагов, то есть - играя за один и тот же прибор у вас есть шанс либо попасть в адскую мясорубку, либо пройти уровень без особых трудностей, т.к. вам может попасться легкая связка врагов
+ огромное количество ачивок всех цветов и расцеветок

- когда убиваете босса, из него дропается нужный там продукт, который отображается в левом нижнем углу. Визуально так же у вас может появиться эффект щита, дополнительных выстрелов и тд. Но нигде нет никакой информации по этому поводу. Хотелось бы знать больше
- опять же таки по поводу недостатка информации - у каждого из играбельных приборов своё коли-во брони и тип атаки, но это нигде не указано. Можно было бы и написать
- отсутствует выбор уровня сложности (игра как-то сама может под вас подстроиться, но для этого потребуется несколько попыток, в результате которых вы можете сгореть. Как я.)

В целом игра хороша. Никаких багов за время игры я не нашел. С каждым убитым врагом чувство боевого азарта только нарастает, жаль только я жил относительно недолго.

22792132.review:
[h1]An Arcade Action Bullet-Hell Shooter[/h1]
https://youtu.be/pdMoqwZ92ko
+ Pretty silly themes of using kitchen appliances as your player object, and being attacked by all sorts of random things like toilets, hairbrushes, and paintcans
+ Very catchy soundtrack that I loved listening to
+ You can unlock new objects to play as, and each object has a different form of attack and hitpoints which adds to replayability

[b]This game is in Early Access so don't take these too seriously[/b]

- There's no indication of how much health bosses have

22772497.review: Great game! Love the arcade style and cant wait for more content to come out. Can be extremely addicting and definetly worth the price.

22772399.review:
[h1]Introduction[/h1]
Champions of Breakfast was published on the 1st April 2016 which was developed and published by Pirate Software. The game itself focused completely on the buillet hell genre, but taking a kind of unique turn on the enemies and 'ships' that you are to shoot your enemies down with.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
For me, bullet hell seems to be a over used and repetitve genre that lacks user progression and gets repetitve rather quickly. Not saying that Champions of Breakfast is a 'perfect' bullet hell game, but it does cover a few areas that some other bullet hell games don't.  I am sure most of you reading this are famailar with the bullet hell genre of gaming. This game really does fit well in a sort of weird and unique way. First thing to note is all of your 'ships' are now machines that you use to make breakfast with, and your enemies are bottles, paintings, paint, toilets, sofa and bascially any other furnature that you can think of. Your objective is simple. Destory all furniture, Why? Well that's the thing, the game doesn't really set up a reason for you doing so, which isn't exactly suprising because most bullet hell games don't.

With the enemies that you encounter in various places in the house and outside, all of them will do different attacks that you should probably want to remember so that you are ready for what they are about to do. (Taking out the bosses that you reach mid-way and at the end of a area for the time being, I will talk about them after) Here is a select few unique attacks that some of the enemies do: small bullets, large bullets, throws paint on the ground, spray, bouncing bullets and so many more that you will encounter as your progress through the game. With that, and the way that they are placed makes it even more difficult as they will crowd you making it very difficult to be able to dodge bullets.

Now going onto the bosses that you will encounter twice through one course. The bosses are obviously way more difficult than the average enemies that you will find before encountering the boss. These bosses have special attacks that normal enemies don't have, and some of them are so over powered. With each of them having their own, shall we say, bullet style making them all unique and very different from one another. Some of the bosses include: sofa, toilet, toolbox, drain pipe and many more. Some of these bosses have a shield of some description which protects them from getting hit. In order to get rid of this sheild you will have to kill the enemies that they spawn in. Yet another unique and clever idea that seperates this from other bullet hell games. Sometimes this can be a bit tricky, and making you repeat the game over and over which could be a drawback for those who are new to the bullet hell genre of gaming.

The game is laid out in stages, each stage having two bosses and their own set of enemies that will only appear in that specific area. Upon completing each area and killing the boss, you will be granted with a choice of powerups that can help you along your journey and trust me, you're going to need it. Other special abilities are only temporary but will give you a short boost of more bullets or a spread attack. There has obviously been a lot of thought and care that has gone into this game.

The graphics of this game are plain and simple. The enemies are noticable, meaning that you will be able to tell which of them you have to shoot. The game also has this nice warning sign everytime that enemies will appear on screen to avoid any cheap deaths throughout the game. The different types of bullets is rather impressive, most of the enemies have their own sort of bullet that makes it different from others that are also attacking you. As for your bullets, it's clearly noticable which are your and which are the enemies.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
+ Unique selection of breakfast machinary
+ Unique enemies 
+ Each enemy has it's own attack
+ Enemies laid out to make the game more challenging
+ Challenging bosses, each having their own unique 'bullet style'
+ Many areas to complete
+ Plain and simple graphics, warning signs to avoid cheap deaths
+ Steam Trading cards and achievements

[h1]Cons[/h1]
- Gets repetitve if your not used to the bullet hell genre
- No story or real purpose to kill, but who really cares

[h1]Result / Final Thoughts[/h1]
I think that the developers really did well with this game. It really does balance fun and difficult together nicely to make the game enjoyable and not feel like the game is just focusing purely upon difficulty. The enemies and bosses that you encounter all have their own unique attacks and bullets. There are some nice special abilities that you can aquire to make the game a bit easier on yourself. I would definatly recommened this game, especially if you love the bullet hell genre!

[b]Rating: 8.9/10[/b]

22682388.review:
OK! I have absorbed all the goodness this game has to offer!
Flying flapjacks! it's harder than you would think.
Offers two control schemes (keyboard and mouse, or controller) Each has it's strong points, so everyone can play the way they want!

There's multiple "champions" to choose from, each with their own stats, abilities, firing patterns/rates/power, etc, and on top of that! All of the "super foods" that drop from bosses and mid-bosses, all have varying effects for each "champion"! 

If THAT wasn't enough variety, the game also includes "The Spice Rack" which lets you amp up the game's difficulty for a score bnous, it maxes out at just over 1800% bonus if you choose ALL of them!

The soundtrack is great as well, fuels you up to fire away ^^

** Thanks to good devs, they are updating alot, recently changing the game's levels to be randomized, instead fo always starting off in the bathroom (like iot used to be) This was  GREAT move, it gives players a chance to feel out all the maps.

in closing, great shoot em up, if you liekt his style of game, and a challenge, and a TON of achievements, you're gonna want to get this one ^^b

(PPS, the devs are even adding a whole new level, bosses, and other things soon!)

22557702.review:
Addictive and very fun, simple to pickup, easy to learn, tough to master. You start out as a toaster(there is also a mixer, and teapot) dodging your way though various forms of breakfast and home appliances. All with different mechanics, that leave you feeling rewarded once you learn the best ways to deal with each enemy type. You pick up various power ups as the game progresses, that make you stronger the longer you live.

The levels start out simple and get harder as mini bosses start to appear. This can lead to some very intense moments where you find yourself holding your breath just to dodge a projectile. The dodging feels intuitive and the controls are responsive, which is important for a bullet dodge game after all.

The levels look great, the soundtrack is amazing, and the game play is the cherry on top.

Buy this game yesterday! What are you waiting for? GET IT!
